project.name: Omiga
project.desc: A decentralized inscription protocol on CKB, empowering fair minting and management of digital assets like MEMES, fueling cross-chain innovation and boosting Nervos Network's ecosystem.

project.name: iCKB
project.desc: A protocol that tokenizes NervosDAO deposits into liquid iCKB tokens. It addresses the ~30-day lockup of CKB in NervosDAO by allowing users to withdraw mature deposits from a shared pool, maintaining inflation protection while enabling flexible use in DeFi.

project.name: UTXO Global Wallet
project.desc: A wallet for managing UTXO-based blockchain assets, built on Nervos CKB. It supports DeFi applications, integrates with the RGB++ protocol for asset management and trading, and is the first wallet available as both a Telegram integration and a Chrome extension.

project.name: CAT Fusion
project.desc: The first Telegram-based hyper-casual game on the CKB, players battle bosses, upgrade their cat-themed digital assets, and compete on leaderboards to earn rewards, likely in the form of CKB tokens or NFTs.

sparkGranted.name: Quantum Purse
sparkGranted.desc: A pioneering anti-quantum wallet developed on the CKB blockchain

highlighted.name: NervDao
highlighted.desc: NervDao is a dApp on Nervos CKB, streamlining Nervos DAO interaction. It supports wallets like MetaMask and JoyID for easy CKB deposits/withdrawals, offering rewards and dilution protection. Features include auto-compounded rewards, a one-month lockup, and plans for UI upgrades and NFT credentials.

highlighted.name: CKBull
highlighted.desc: A non-custodial mobile wallet for Nervos Network (CKB), launched in July 2022 by Peersyst Technology. It supports managing CKB, bridged tokens via ForceBridge, NFTs, and Nervos DAO staking. Built on CKBâ€™s secure Layer 1 and UTXO-based Cell model, it offers a customizable interface on Android and iOS, though some users report withdrawal issues

highlighted.name: Mobit
highlighted.desc: An enigmatic protocol on CKB, transmutes the blockchain into a crucible of boundless transformation, where its alchemical essence empowers users to conjure unique digital artifacts.

premium.name: JoyID
premium.desc: A luminous thread in the CKB tapestry, weaves a decentralized identity realm where users wield sovereign control over their digital essence across blockchain's boundless stage. Its elegant fusion of passkey authentication and cross-chain sensory perception empowers users.

premium.name: Nervape
premium.desc: A vibrant digital realm on the CKB blockchain, offers an extraordinary haven where creators conjure and trade digital treasures across chains, igniting a seamless alchemy of cross-chain artistry amidst CKB's ecosystem, creating a constellation of developers and artists in a harmonious digital tapestry.

premium.name: DotBit
premium.desc: A decentralized identity protocol on CKB, weaves a cross-chain tapestry of domain, user-friendly addresses, and secure management of digital identity and asset management across blockchains.

premium.name: Stable++
premium.desc: A decentralized stablecoin protocol on CKB, crafts BUSD through over-collateralized BTC assets, enhancing stability and liquidity across the Bitcoin and RGB++ ecosystems.

premium.name: VeriX
premium.desc: A bot on CKB, empowers seamless trading and fair issuance, enriching Nervos Network's vibrant ecosystem.

community.name: UTXO Swap
community.desc: UTXO Swap is a decentralized exchange built on Nervos CKB Layer 2, designed for seamless, intent-driven trading.

community.name: imagiNation
community.desc: A marketplace on Nervos CKB, enabling fully on-chain asset creation, trading, and value capture, with plans to support RGB++.

community.name: Philosopher's Stone
community.desc: An enigmatic protocol on CKB, transmutes the blockchain into a crucible of boundless transformation.

community.name: JoyGift
community.desc: A heartfelt melody on the CKB, orchestrates a digital red envelope tradition, where users share personalized tales.

community.name: HueHub
community.desc: A decentralized exchange on CKB, empowers seamless trading and fair issuance, enriching Nervos Network's vibrant ecosystem.
